profile.name: Matt Tanthai Cosh
profile.bio: A determined and ambitious undergraduate, majoring in Information Systems and Networking Engineering (ISNE) at Chiang Mai University (CMU) with a strong foundation in engineering and technology, and a track record in innovative projects and competitions.

education.program: Faculty of Engineering, Information System and Networking Engineering (ISNE) 3rd year Undergraduate

honors.title: Intel ® AI Global Impact Festival – Global Award Winner 2022
honors.eventDescription: Annual festival by Intel that spotlights AI-powered student innovations aimed at real-world impact.
honors.myExperience: As part of the 13–17 age category, I developed the CS-M Tool, an AI solution that won the Global Award.

honors.title: Microsoft Imagine Cup 2023 – World Runner-up
honors.eventDescription: A global student tech competition hosted by Microsoft, showcasing projects with social or environmental impact.
honors.myExperience: As the core developer of CS-M Tool, I led software architecture and UI design. Our team placed 2nd globally.

projects.title: Cardiac Self-Monitoring Tool (CS-M Tool)
projects.description: An AI-powered healthcare application designed to monitor cardiac health through advanced image processing and machine learning techniques.

projects.title: AI Trading System
projects.description: Professional AI-powered trading automation with real-time portfolio monitoring, featuring 22 trained models across stocks, crypto, and forex.

roadmap.title: AI Trading System
roadmap.experience: Developed a comprehensive AI-powered trading automation system with 22 trained models across stocks, crypto, and forex.

roadmap.title: Intel ® AI Global Impact Festival – Global Award Winner
roadmap.experience: Developed the CS-M Tool, won the Global Award, and refined my pitch and technical communication under mentorship.
